quotes.message: Let go of yesterday. Let today be a new beginning and be the best that you can, and you'll get to where God wants you to be.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: No river can return to its source, yet all rivers must have a beginning.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Dissatisfaction is a great starting point, for it is right there that we have the most power, strength, and energy to push change through.
quotes.name: David DeNotaris

quotes.message: For last year's words belong to last year's language. And next year's words await another voice. And to make an end is to make a beginning.
quotes.name: T.S. Eliot

quotes.message: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.name: Carl Bard

quotes.message: Be willing to be a beginner every single morning.
quotes.name: Meister Eckhart

quotes.message: Whatever you do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius and power and magic in it.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Every day is a new beginning. Treat it that way. Stay away from what might have been, and look at what can be.
quotes.name: Marsha Petrie Sue

quotes.message: You can learn new things at any time in your life if you're willing to be a beginner. If you actually learn to like being a beginner, the whole world opens up to you.
quotes.name: Barabra Sher

quotes.message: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.name: St. Francis of Assisi

quotes.message: One can begin so many things with a new person! - even begin to be a better man.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Morning will come, it has no choice.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: Starting over is an acceptance of a past we can't change, an unrelenting conviction that the future can be different, and the stubborn wisdom to use the past to make the future what the past was not.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: Every sunset is an opportunity to reset.
quotes.name: Richie Norton

quotes.message: Every man should be born again on the first day of January. Start with a fresh page.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Begin today. Declare out loud to the universe that you are willing to let go of struggle and eager to learn through joy.
quotes.name: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.message: Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect.
quotes.name: Alan Cohen

quotes.message: The secret to living the life of your dreams is to start living the life of your dreams today, in every little way you possibly can.
quotes.name: Mike Dooley

quotes.message: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
quotes.name: J. B. Priestly

quotes.message: You don't need endless time and perfect conditions. Do it now. Do it today. Do it for twenty minutes and watch your heart start beating.
quotes.name: Barbara Sher

quotes.message: The journey of a thousand leagues begins with a single step. So we must never neglect any work of peace within our reach, however small.
quotes.name: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.message: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.name: Joe Sabah

quotes.message: What the caterpillar calls the end the rest of the world calls a butterfly.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Dreams are renewable. No matter what our age or condition, there are still untapped possibilities within us and new beauty waiting to be born.
quotes.name: Dale Turner

quotes.message: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: A time comes when you need to stop waiting for the man you want to become and start being the man you want to be.
quotes.name: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.message: We will open the book. Its pages are blank. We are going to put words on them ourselves. The book is called Opportunity and its first chapter is New Year's Day.
quotes.name: Edith Lovejoy Pierce

quotes.message: Genuine beginnings begin within us, even when they are brought to our attention by external opportunities.
quotes.name: William Throsby Bridges

quotes.message: Every day is a fresh beginning, Every morn is the world made new.
quotes.name: Sarah Chauncey Woolsey

quotes.message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Starting over can be challenging, but also it can be a great opportunity to do things differently.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: The beginning is always today.
quotes.name: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.message: You will never win if you never begin.
quotes.name: Helen Rowland

quotes.message: What we call the beginning is often the end. And to make an end is to make a beginning. The end is where we start from.
quotes.name: T.S. Eliot

quotes.message: Every day is a new beginning. Treat it that way. Stay away from what might have been, and look at what can be.
quotes.name: Marsha Petrie Sue

quotes.message: The indispensable first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: Decide what you want.
quotes.name: Ben Stein

quotes.message: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Begin somewhere; you cannot build a reputation on what you intend to do.
quotes.name: Liz Smith

quotes.message: The past alone is truly real; the present is but a painful, struggling birth into the immutable being of what is no longer.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: In all beginnings dwells a magic force . For guarding us and helping us to live . Serenely let us move to distant places . And let no sentiments of home detain us.
quotes.name: Hermann Hesse

quotes.message: Look: the constant marigold . Springs again from hidden roots.. Baffled gardener, you behold . New beginnings and new shoots . Spring again from hidden roots.. Pull or stab or cut or burn . They will ever yet return.
quotes.name: Robert Graves

quotes.message: In all beginnings dwells a magic force . For guarding us and helping us to live . Serenely let us move to distant places . And let no sentiments of home detain us.
quotes.name: Hermann Hesse

quotes.message: In happiness and pain the love we share and hope of tomorrow brings light to the dawning day. Greeting each morning as a gift of new beginnings.
quotes.name: Mark Langendorf

quotes.message: If you can make one heap of all your winnings . And risk it on one turn of pitch-and-toss,. And lose, and start again at your beginnings,. And never breathe a word about your loss.
quotes.name: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.message: The whole world's broke and it ain't worth fixing . It's time to start all over, make a new beginning . There's too much pain, too much suffering .
quotes.name: Tracy L. Chapman

quotes.message: If I stay, would you put an end . To all the games you play . Can you promise me . That you will never stray . Has to be a new beginning from today.
quotes.name: Guillaume Mathieu

quotes.message: Save me this ain't over . And maybe we are much closer . To every dream we had . I wish it could be just a new beginning.
quotes.name: Dave Roth

quotes.message: My world is brighter . My view much wider . New beginning, first breath of air . I'm so aware of new beginning . I'm thankful for the chance to start again . I've turned the page, a change came with the wind . It's not the end, it's a new beginning.
quotes.name: Blue Miller

quotes.message: In the deserts of the heart . Let the healing fountain start . In the prison of his days . Teach the free man how to praise.
quotes.name: W.H. Auden

quotes.message: The work, my friend, is peace. More than an end of this war--an end to the beginnings of all wars.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: If you really want to make a milliion, the quickest way is to start your own religion.
quotes.name: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.message: My love is of a birth as rare . As 'tis for object strange and high. It was begotten by despair . Upon impossibility.
quotes.name: Susan Ratcliffe

quotes.message: The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide you’re not going to stay where you are.
quotes.name: J.P. Morgan

quotes.message: Celebrate endings—for they precede new beginnings.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: Every day is a chance to begin again. Don’t focus on the failures of yesterday, start today with positive thoughts and expectations.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Nothing is predestined. The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings.
quotes.name: Ralph Blum

quotes.message: It’s never too late to become who you want to be. I hope you live a life that you’re proud of, and if you find that you’re not, I hope you have the strength to start over.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
quotes.name: Guy Finley

quotes.message: You can learn new things at any time in your life if you’re willing to be a beginner. If you actually learn to like being a beginner, the whole world opens up to you.
quotes.name: Barbara Shur

quotes.message: Keep on beginning and failing. Each time you fail, start all over again, and you will grow stronger until you have accomplished a purpose – not the one you began with perhaps, but one you’ll be glad to remember.
quotes.name: Anne Sulivan

quotes.message: The splendid thing about falling apart silently...is that you can start over as many times as you like.
quotes.name: Sanober Khan

quotes.message: Now I've gone for too long . Living like I'm not alive . So I'm going to start over tonight . Beginning with you and I.
quotes.name: Hayley Williams

quotes.message: There is always a new begining...Doors are unlimited, always open, if one closes and that moment the other opens.
quotes.name: Vandana Agarwal

quotes.message: Ruins, for me, are the beginning. With the debris, you can construct new ideas. They are symbols of a beginning.
quotes.name: Anselm Kiefer

quotes.message: Don't look to the past with sorrow, you will never walk there again. Look to the now and make it beautiful.
quotes.name: Mimi Novic
